review: I am totally happy and satisfied with Dr.Beena's treatment. I cannot say enough wonderful things about her. ***** ** **** * ***** ***** * ********* ****** *** ******** All I can say is I was so lucky to have found her. I only regret for not having seen or met her much before , I got to know about this amazing doctor through a friend of mine and I will strongly recommend all those with gynaec issues to meet Dr.Beena without any second thought or opinion. She will find a solution for you, a permanent solution. I can guarantee on that.  She never made me feel uncomfortable or bad for asking so many questions. Each time I see her, she has a smile on her face, no matter how big or complicated your problem is, she will make you feel at ease and give you the perfect treatment. I have always walked out from the clinic with great peace and contentment, thats how she makes you feel.  She is a best gyne I ever experienced. Before meeting Dr.Beena, I have consulted with many other gyne who are just professional with their patients. However, Dr. Beena is out of the world I would say. **** *** ***** Hats off to you Doctor... I would once  again recommend everyone to consult doctor Beena and get best advice all the time. God Bless you Doctor...
She listened the problem patiently. Gone through all reports. She did a physical check tge explained what's issue, what yo be done. She is very calm and gave enough support.

review: I visited beena for my pregnancy and she is friendly and nvr suggested any unneccassary tests and she supported me during my labour and eventhough its c section she showed me baby and advised me for early breastfeeding after 3hrs from c section.she helped me in fast recovery .Thanks beena for her support.

review: I went to Manipal clinic to Dr Beena Jeysingh three times with waiting time of over an hour every time. And the disappointment was that there was no diagnosis. I had an MRI and USG , but no diagnosis on what type of cyst and what to do with it. No way to followup without going to the hospital.
